alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 01 at 10:08AM EDT until November 01 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Northern Erie and Southern Erie counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow with snowfall rates of one inch per hour will be possible this morning. Snow totals will be lower along the immediate lakeshore.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
